Achievements.Name: Landfall
Achievements.Description: Finish the first mission of the Campaign on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

Achievements.Name: Holdout
Achievements.Description: Finish the second mission of the Campaign on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

Achievements.Name: The Road
Achievements.Description: Finish the third mission of the Campaign on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

Achievements.Name: Assault
Achievements.Description: Finish the fourth mission of the Campaign on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

Achievements.Name: Cleansing
Achievements.Description: Finish the fifth mission of the Campaign on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

Achievements.Name: Refuge
Achievements.Description: Finish the sixth mission of the Campaign on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

Achievements.Name: Last Stand
Achievements.Description: Finish the seventh mission of the Campaign on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

Achievements.Name: The Key
Achievements.Description: Finish the eighth mission of the Campaign on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

Achievements.Name: Return
Achievements.Description: Finish the final mission of the Campaign on Normal, Heroic, or Legendary.

Achievements.Name: Campaign Complete:  Normal
Achievements.Description: Finish the Campaign on Normal.

Achievements.Name: Campaign Complete:  Heroic
Achievements.Description: Finish the Campaign on Heroic (unlocks achievement for Normal, if not earned).

Achievements.Name: Campaign Complete:  Legendary
Achievements.Description: Finish the Campaign on Legendary (unlocks achievements for Normal and Heroic, if not earned).

Achievements.Name: Iron
Achievements.Description: Find and claim this skull when playing on Normal, Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Black Eye
Achievements.Description: Find and claim this skull when playing on Normal, Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Tough Luck
Achievements.Description: Find and claim this skull when playing on Normal, Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Catch
Achievements.Description: Find and claim this skull when playing on Normal, Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Fog
Achievements.Description: Find and claim this skull when playing on Normal, Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Famine
Achievements.Description: Find and claim this skull when playing on Normal, Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Thunderstorm
Achievements.Description: Find and claim this skull when playing on Normal, Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Tilt
Achievements.Description: Find and claim this skull when playing on Normal, Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Mythic
Achievements.Description: Find and claim this skull when playing on Normal, Heroic or Legendary difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Graduate
Achievements.Description: Earn 5 EXP or finish 10 games to complete the requirements for basic training (Online).

Achievements.Name: UNSC Spartan
Achievements.Description: Earn your Sergeant rating to be recognized as a true Spartan (Online).

Achievements.Name: Spartan Officer
Achievements.Description: Advance to the Spartan Officer ranks (Online).

Achievements.Name: Two for One
Achievements.Description: Score a Double Kill with a single spartan laser shot in a ranked free for all playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Too Close to the Sun
Achievements.Description: Destroy an enemy banshee with the spartan laser or missile pod in a ranked playlist or in campaign.

Achievements.Name: Triple Kill
Achievements.Description: Kill 3 enemies within 4 seconds of one another in a ranked free for all playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Overkill
Achievements.Description: Kill 4 enemies within 4 seconds of one another in a ranked free for all playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Lee R Wilson Memorial
Achievements.Description: Score 5 grenade sticks in any ranked free for all playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Weâ€™re in for some Chop
Achievements.Description: Destroy an enemy vehicle with equipment in a ranked playlist or in campaign.

Achievements.Name: Killing Frenzy
Achievements.Description: Kill 10 enemies without dying in any ranked free for all playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Steppin' Razor
Achievements.Description: Score a Triple Kill with the sword in a ranked free for all playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Mongoose Mowdown
Achievements.Description: Splatter an enemy with the mongoose in a ranked free for all playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Up Close and Personal
Achievements.Description: Kill 5 enemies by melee or assassination in a ranked free for all playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Fear the Pink Mist
Achievements.Description: Kill 5 enemies with the needler in a ranked free for all playlist or in campaign.

Achievements.Name: Headshot Honcho
Achievements.Description: Kill 10 enemies with headshots in a ranked free for all playlist or in campaign.

Achievements.Name: Used Car Salesman
Achievements.Description: Destroy a vehicle that has three enemies in it in a ranked playlist or in campaign.

Achievements.Name: Marathon Man
Achievements.Description: Locate and access all Terminals in the Campaign.

Achievements.Name: MVP
Achievements.Description: Earn the MVP in any ranked playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Maybe Next Time Buddy
Achievements.Description: Board the same vehicle within 10 seconds after being boarded in any free for all playlist (Online).

Achievements.Name: Guerilla
Achievements.Description: Score over 15,000 points in the Campaign meta-game on the first mission.

Achievements.Name: Demon
Achievements.Description: Score over 15,000 points in the Campaign meta-game on the second mission.

Achievements.Name: Cavalier
Achievements.Description: Score over 15,000 points in the Campaign meta-game on the third mission.

Achievements.Name: Askar
Achievements.Description: Score over 15,000 points in the Campaign meta-game on the fourth mission.

Achievements.Name: Exterminator
Achievements.Description: Score over 15,000 points in the Campaign meta-game on the fifth mission.

Achievements.Name: Ranger
Achievements.Description: Score over 50,000 points in the Campaign meta-game on the sixth mission.

Achievements.Name: Vanguard
Achievements.Description: Score over 50,000 points in the Campaign meta-game on the seventh mission.

Achievements.Name: Orpheus
Achievements.Description: Score over 15,000 points in the Campaign meta-game on the eighth mission.

Achievements.Name: Reclaimer
Achievements.Description: Score over 15,000 points in the Campaign meta-game on the final mission.
